title: About Lp Decay...
body:
(H)ello

Let's get straight into question that i have :p

I've been playing LoL for more than 3 years now but i still dont know how lp decay system works. I am currently stuck in plat 3. Does my account’s lp decay start after a week since i stopped playing rank game? Or is it 28 days? And how much of my lp does it cut mine down?

Asking this question because I am living in Australia atm but think I’ll visit ma homeland which is Korea for 2~3 weeks to get something solved.
And I am a bit worried cuz as you all know, accounts can’t be transfered to Korean server.

Plz help my dead brain smart summoners :3

replies.body:
28 days in Plat and Diamond, less in Master and Challenger. On that 28 days you'll lose 35 LP and again every 7 days after that. If you fall to or below 0 as a result of decay you'll be demoted a division.

So basically, play a game the day before you leave and you'll be fine :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q1
